Massachusetts has some of the highest costs of living in America, yet the Bay State's students, professionals, and families still need reliable phone service. Vouch Mobile delivers Boston-quality coverage at a price that makes sense.

Network

AT&T Coverage in Massachusetts

Vouch Mobile operates on AT&T's award-winning network, providing Massachusetts residents with reliable 5G and LTE coverage across the Bay State. With 99% population coverage, you'll stay connected wherever you go.

According to the FCC Broadband Map, AT&T provides extensive wireless coverage throughout Massachusetts, including urban centers and many rural areas.

Benefits

Why Massachusetts Residents Choose Vouch

Massachusetts' average phone bill of $121/month is among the nation's highest—Vouch cuts that by 75%.

Whether you're on the T, walking through Harvard Square, or commuting on the Mass Pike, you need coverage that keeps up.

No credit check means MIT students, new Boston residents, and healthcare workers can sign up instantly.

AT&T's network covers Massachusetts from Boston to the Berkshires, with excellent coverage along the I-95 corridor.

    FAQ

    Massachusetts Coverage Questions

    Everything you need to know about Vouch Mobile in Massachusetts

    Yes! Vouch Mobile provides 99% population coverage across Massachusetts using AT&T's network. From Boston to Springfield, Worcester to Cape Cod, you'll have reliable 5G and LTE service throughout the Bay State.

    Vouch Mobile operates on AT&T's network in Massachusetts. AT&T provides extensive 5G coverage throughout Greater Boston and reliable LTE across the state, including Cape Cod and the Berkshires.

    Vouch Mobile costs $30/month for unlimited talk, text, and data—no matter where you live in Massachusetts. The average Bay Stater pays $121/month for phone service, so you could save over $1,092 per year by switching to Vouch.

    No credit check required. Whether you're a Harvard student, a new Boston resident, or rebuilding your credit, you can sign up for Vouch Mobile instantly.

    Switching is easy: check that your phone is unlocked, order a free Vouch SIM card shipped to your Massachusetts address, then activate online in minutes. You can keep your existing phone number—we'll handle the port.

    Yes! 5G is available in Boston, Cambridge, Worcester, Springfield, Lowell, New Bedford, and many other Massachusetts cities. Your 5G access is included free with your $30/month plan.

    Yes. You'll have coverage throughout the MBTA system, including subway stations on the Red, Orange, Blue, and Green Lines, plus commuter rail throughout Greater Boston.

    Yes. AT&T's network provides reliable coverage throughout Cape Cod and the Islands, perfect for year-round residents and summer visitors alike.
